text: Jan Ivar "Janne" Halvarsson (26 December 1942 – 5 May 2020) was a Swedish cross-country skier. He was born in Östersund, Sweden. He won a silver medal at the 1968 Winter Olympics. Halvarsson died on 5 May 2020 in Hammerdal, Sweden, aged 77.Biographical information: Jan Halvarsson, Olympedia.Death notice ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Swedish skiers Category:Olympic silver medalists for Sweden
title: Jan Halvarsson
